alert.note: Alert for Atoka; Coal (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 20 at 2:48PM CST until November 20 at 3:30PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Coal County in southeastern Oklahoma... Northeastern Atoka County in southeastern Oklahoma... * Until 330 PM CST. * At 248 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles north of Coalgate, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Coalgate, Stringtown, Wardville, Atoka Reservoir, northern McGee Creek Lake, Redden, and Chockie. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
